ModMetaData.name: NilchEi Personality Traits
ModMetaData.author: NilchEi
ModMetaData.description:
Adds following personality traits: Competitive, Determinist, Fickle, Tsundere.
Competitive: Faster learning speed. Has -8 mood debuff if any colonist is more skilled, and gains +12 mood buff if no one does. Fickle: occasionally change their passion on a whim. Tsundere: more likely to slight and insult someone they like, and less likely to slight and insult someone they hate. However, they are "honest" about their opinions toward someone they have romantic relationship with. -10% market value.
-- For 1.2+ version -- Determinist: Will change expectations randomly, and will gain global work speed bonus if low expectation is rolled and vice versa. Repressive: Ignores minor and major mental break at cost of temporary -5 debuff, always will trigger catatonia as extreme major break.
